attic-polygene-java_fec7338.message:
o Fix test cases.
  o core-tests
    o Fix [NullPointerException] bug at [org.qi4j.runtime.composite.CompositeModelContext]:
      o This exception is thrown when there is no constraint declaration in the "method to invoke"s parameters.
o Fix [TODO] at [org.qi4j.runtime.ObjectBuilderImpl#newInstance]
o First attempt to refactor [Chronos] application.
  o The [web.xml] to instantiate the [ChronosWebAppFactory] is currently commented out.


git-svn-id: https://scm.ops4j.org/repos/ops4j/projects/qi4j/libraries@9481 9b982a3c-3ae5-0310-a4bc-d9a3335569bd

attic-polygene-java_b9eac15.message:
o Modularizing the RDF Indexer so we can have persisted and remote repositories.
o Added some more descriptive Exceptions for non-registered Composites/Entities/Services. Also, found one case where the UOW would throw a NPE instead of reporting a missing registration.


git-svn-id: https://scm.ops4j.org/repos/ops4j/projects/qi4j/libraries@11648 9b982a3c-3ae5-0310-a4bc-d9a3335569bd

Applied patch for QI-41 (NPE in EntityCompositeInstance)

attic-polygene-java_063b1ca.message:
Do not initialize Property<Collection<X>> as il looks like is not yet working.
Resolve NPE in teatrDown() if exception in setup().

attic-polygene-java_c04646f.message:
o Fix test cases.
  o core-tests
    o Fix [NullPointerException] bug at [org.qi4j.runtime.composite.CompositeModelContext]:
      o This exception is thrown when there is no constraint declaration in the "method to invoke"s parameters.
o Fix [TODO] at [org.qi4j.runtime.ObjectBuilderImpl#newInstance]
o First attempt to refactor [Chronos] application.
  o The [web.xml] to instantiate the [ChronosWebAppFactory] is currently commented out.

attic-polygene-java_808461d.message:
o Modularizing the RDF Indexer so we can have persisted and remote repositories.
o Added some more descriptive Exceptions for non-registered Composites/Entities/Services. Also, found one case where the UOW would throw a NPE instead of reporting a missing registration.


git-svn-id: https://scm.ops4j.org/repos/ops4j/projects/qi4j/extensions@11648 9b982a3c-3ae5-0310-a4bc-d9a3335569bd

attic-polygene-java_d930661.message:
o Modularizing the RDF Indexer so we can have persisted and remote repositories.
o Added some more descriptive Exceptions for non-registered Composites/Entities/Services. Also, found one case where the UOW would throw a NPE instead of reporting a missing registration.
